original_text: So the God of Israel caused King Pul of Assyria to attack their land. That king is also called King Tiglath-Pileser. He won the fight against the people of Reuben, Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh. He took them away as his prisoners to Halah, to Habor, to Hara and to the Gozan river. They are still living there, even today.
korean_text: 그러므로 이스라엘 하나님이 앗수르 왕 불의 마음을 일으키시며 앗수르 왕 디글랏 빌레셀의 마음을 일으키시매 곧 르우벤과 갓과 므낫세 반 지파를 사로잡아 할라와 하볼과 하라와 고산 강 가에 옮긴지라 그들이 오늘까지 거기에 있으니라

sentences.original_text: So the God of Israel caused King Pul of Assyria
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘의 하나님은 앗수르의 왕 풀에게

sentences.original_text: That king is also called King Tiglath-Pileser
He won the fight against the people of Reuben
against Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh
He took them away as his prisoners
to Halah, to Habor, to Hara and to the Gozan river
sentences.korean_translation: 할라, 호보르, 하라와 고산 강으로 데려갔습니다
